As an online business selling goods and services, it’s absolutely vital to set up a payment gateway for your online shop that accepts all major credit cards. Aside from the fact that accepting cash via the internet isn’t feasible, credit and debit cards are one of the most common ways that people (Americans, especially) make payments.

According to Forbes, not only are credit cards nearly as common as cash in the USA, nearly every person has at least one in their wallet. In fact, Community Merchants USA projects that about 66 percent of all point-of-sales transactions are done with plastic — in other words, debit, credit, and gift cards.

Why does this matter for your e-commerce business in the UAE? UAE is a shopping spree country with booming e-commerce sales (skyrocketing to about $10 billion U.S. in 2018). About 135 e-commerce websites are currently operating in the UAE.

The good news? There are hundreds of credit card processors out there that can help you power your e-commerce sales. The bad news, they’re not all created equally. Every payment service is going to bring about different strengths and weaknesses, like their service models, their security features, and their processing fees.

Though having a payment gateway in place to accept these payment types, it’s vital to ensure you’re picking out a reliable, secure, efficient, and affordable one, too.

We’ve combed through dozens of the payment gateway systems to bring you our list of the top 5 payment gateways in the UAE that you should consider for your e-commerce business.

First, though, let’s dive into some of the important factors you need to consider when choosing a payment gateway system.

Choosing the Best Payment Gateway for Your UAE E-commerce Business

As we said above, not all payment gateway systems are created equally. It’s not enough to just have a payment gateway system for your UAE e-commerce business, you need a quality payment gateway that’s secure, efficient, and affordable.

Here are a few factors you should consider on your quest for the ultimate payment gateway system.

Security

Security matters — both for you and for your customers. As more consumers continue to choose online shopping, it’s vital that you provide them with secure payment options like the bigger brands so that they feel comfortable purchasing from you.

This could come in many forms — some gateways let you customize the template to reflect your brand (logo, color, typeface, and more) to ease customers minds about working with a third-party site. Other important factors are anti-fraud protection and PCI-DSS certification.

Fees

There are several different fee structures you’ll need to consider for your payment gateway system. Understanding each of them can help you understand what a payment gateway system will actually cost you. A monthly fee will charge you based on membership fees, a transactional fee will charge you for each transaction, and set-up fees, which apply to the initial set-up of your payment gateway.

Customer Support

The reality of running an e-commerce business is that there are, inevitably, going to be a few hiccups. That certainly isn’t limited to your payment gateway system. This is where choosing a gateway system with excellent customer service matters. By choosing a gateway system with excellent, consistent, 24–7 customer service support, you’re able to quickly resolve any technical problem and avoid losing customers.

Multi-Currency Support

It’s vital that your e-commerce business in the UAE is able to accept credit cards and all major forms of payment, but if you’re planning to expand your e-commerce site globally, you also need to consider multi-currency support. If you’re planning to offer your shop across the globe, your gateway system must be able to support all sorts of currency.

The Top Five Payment Gateways in UAE

Without further ado, here are the top five payment gateways in the UAE! Each has their own strengths and weaknesses, so read up on each to see how they fit into your e-commerce plans.

Telr

An old but reliable service, Telr is an online payment gateway system that’s gathered valuable experience that enables them to deliver premium payment gateway services to e-commerce shops. This platform is meticulously and carefully designed to meet the needs of e-commerce businesses operating in Africa and the Middle East.

PayFort

This system is one of the most popular in UAE because it does not require a start-up fee and offers affordable monthly fees in starter packages. An Amazon company, PayFort carries a trusted name, convenient (and affordable) rates, local payment methods, and more.

CC Avenue

This payment gateway system originated in India but has quickly become one of the most popular payment gateways in the UAE. In fact, it’s one of the most preferred methods in the UAE for people engaged in the e-commerce trade. CC Avenue offers simple pricing, customer service, and allows multi-currency options.

Checkout.Com

This payment gateway system is the top choice among younger entrepreneurs who are just starting out in the UAE with their e-commerce shops. The initial fee is relatively low (about $500), allows your business to operate globally with multi-currency functions.

Network International Payment Gateway

This payment gateway system is a merge between two enormous names —Network International and Master Card International, teaming up to provide the MasterCard Internet Gateway Service. To e-commerce entrepreneurs in UAE, it’s considered one of the best e-commerce payment gateway options in the area.

No matter which payment gateway system you choose, it’s incredibly important to work with a courier system you trust. Ensuring your payments are collected properly and your packages are delivered reliably are vital to ensure your e-commerce business is running smoothly.
